name: Color Runner (GGOOTEE, NathanMishlerIU)
description:
In this third-person puzzle game, it is your goal to get through the city and activate color pads to alter your appearance to get through the corresponding blockades to eventually beat the game! Collect orbs along the way to increase your score, but be wary to watch the timer! 

~ Holding shift allows you to run when holding W ~
